comments:
Using a PaletteTemplateEntry without icons causes an Exception when the entry 
is selected.

Using a constructor like: 

new PaletteTemplateEntry("Simple", 
    "Simple comparison",
    new SomeObject(), 
    null, 
    null);

causes the following exception when the entry is selected.
